items.content_html: ForgeForm is a lightweight and powerful form validation library for React applications. Define your form schema and let ForgeForm handle the validation, error handling, and state management.

items.content_html: Gramify is a lightweight and powerful browser extension designed to seamlessly fix grammar mistakes in any text area on any website. Whether you‚Äôre drafting an email, writing a blog post, or engaging on social media, Gramify works quietly in the background to ensure your writing is polished and professional.

items.content_html: A simple To-Do List App built with React and Vite, perfect for beginners to learn state management and component-based UI. It lets users add, edit, delete, and mark tasks as completed, with a clean and responsive design using CSS Modules. Lightweight and fast, it's a great starting project for learning React.
items.title: Athulk5/ToDo: A simple To-Do List App built with React and Vite, perfect for beginners to learn state management and component-based UI. It lets users add, edit, delete, and mark tasks as completed, with a clean and responsive design using CSS Modules. Lightweight and fast, it's a great starting project for learning React.

items.content_html: Task Tracker CLI is a simple command-line tool to manage tasks efficiently. Add, update, delete, and track tasks with a JSON-based storage system. Mark tasks as to-do, in progress, or done and list them by status‚Äîall from the terminal. Lightweight, dependency-free, and easy to use for quick task management.

Mark tasks as to-do, in progress, or done and list them by status‚Äîall from the terminal. Lightweight, dependency-free, and easy to use for quick task management.

items.content_html: A lightweight and modern utility to mask input fields with password-like characters. This library is specifically designed to prevent password managers from automatically saving values, making it ideal for sensitive data handling. It also provides a method to retrieve the original value of the input. Fully compatible with JavaScript and TypeScript.
items.title: krozamdev/masked-password: A lightweight and modern utility to mask input fields with password-like characters. This library is specifically designed to prevent password managers from automatically saving values, making it ideal for sensitive data handling. It also provides a method to retrieve the original value of the input. Fully compatible with JavaScript and TypeScript.
